argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mndvcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | mndvcl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) |
| 3 |  | mndvlid.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` M ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elmapex | |- ( X e. ( B ^m I ) -> ( B e. _V /\ I e. _V ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprd | |- ( X e. ( B ^m I ) -> I e. _V ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( M e. Mnd /\ X e. ( B ^m I ) ) -> I e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_elmapi | |- ( X e. ( B ^m I ) -> X : I --> B ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( M e. Mnd /\ X e. ( B ^m I ) ) -> X : I --> B ) |
| 9 | 1, 3 | #P_mndidcl | |- ( M e. Mnd -> .0. e. B ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. Mnd /\ X e. ( B ^m I ) ) -> .0. e. B ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mndlid | |- ( ( M e. Mnd /\ x e. B ) -> ( .0. .+ x ) = x ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( M e. Mnd /\ X e. ( B ^m I ) ) /\ x e. B ) -> ( .0. .+ x ) = x ) |
| 13 | 6, 8, 10, 12 | #P_caofid0l | |- ( ( M e. Mnd /\ X e. ( B ^m I ) ) -> ( ( I X. { .0. } ) oF .+ X ) = X ) |
